text: Girotti is an Italian surname. Notable people with the surname include: *Camillo Girotti (born 1918), Italian footballer *Gianfranco Girotti (born 1937), Italian titular bishop *Giuseppe Girotti (1905–1945), Italian anti- fascist *Ken Girotti, Canadian television director *Mario Girotti (born 1939), birth name of Italian actor Terence Hill *Massimo Girotti (1918–2003), Italian actor Category:Italian-language surnames
title: Girotti
